overview: Bustin' Loose, Hot Cops Series, Volume 1 stars newcomer, Centaur exclusive, John Ross, in his first edition of Chip Daniels' new HOT COPS SERIES, with Bud Stetson as "The Sheriff". Don't confuse this with "Hot Cops 1, 2 or 3." This is the first instalment on an all new series and it picks up where "Hot Cops 3" left off.  Features 11 of Centaur's hottest models in two-hours of non stop action, including 20 cum shots. With strip searches, whipping, fisting, fucking and sucking, it's a classic you won't see anywhere else.
title: Hot Cops 4: Bustin' Loose
